title: use ida python to add a remark when calling a function using register
content:
I want to add a remark for all non direct function calls. e.g. say i have 
mov EAX [functionEP]
call EAX
Assuming i have many such calls to various functions, I would like to run the debugger and every time there are calls to such function add a remark which states the real call address/function name so that it will be: 
mov EAX [functionEP]
call EAX ; functionName
Is this possible?

comments.text:
I use IDA 7.0 and its done automatically although is for 
lea
. See
i also use ida 7.0 it is not added for all function calls
